channel.title: New Project
channel.description: OK so I got this idea. Its going to be a sword but the thing is that its double bladed so you can take it apart and use it as a duel wield weapon. I was thinking you would need 99 smithing and maybe 100m or what ever in your server to split it or recombined it. So in a sense will be two weapons. This is my rough drawing of it. [img]https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-tbzPnXHnitw/UXqtkiWcRGI/AAAAAAAAARo/AYdUWw5afUg/w382-h509/IMG-20130426-00262.jpg[/img]

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @allinall allinall
item.description:
@allinall wrote:

amy_webb:

Can’t wait to see your finished version, it will be interesting to see the difference in modeling techniques we use.

Yeah Ill get it up as soon as I can but for now I’m heading to bed since its 11:21

Read full topic

@allinall wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:17, topic:517991”]SAT (student assessed task work): These tasks in media are about your folio development, so i’m guessing it is different between schooling systems. Though, they do take a while to get done.

Sorry about not going with your recommended colours, i feel like it should have been a natural colour theme.

[/quote]
It looks nice and yeah good color choice better then mine since all I really did was put my image in meta and outlined the blade

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:13, topic:517991”][quote author=allinall link=topic=636254.msg4292832#msg4292832 date=1367635292]

No judgement here.

It seems as though this model would only take maybe half an hour to make, and it has been around a week now. What’s going on?

Yeah I know I really havent worked on it much at all I have a lot of school work and crap I have to do since finals and tests are coming up and then i also have SATs tomorrow but Ill see when I can work on it.
[/quote]
School sucks, especially when you have an SAT due. I have one due every week for my media subject, so it is easy to understand your work load. Would you mind if i has a crack at trying the concept? I wouldn’t post it publicly, if you don’t want me to.[/quote]An SAT a week? Unless they are different in Australia, the SATs here in the states are used as a measure of where you are academically. Its a 5-6 hour long test, and you get scored in 3 separate sections, how you score greatly affecting on your likelihood of getting accepted into colleges. I took one in January, scoring a 1720 overall, and I’m taking it again in June

OT: The concept looks really cool, and the idea behind it can make it very versatile in a server! I’ve always loved the concepts of items being splittable/joinable, especially since I’ve made a set like that myself I can’t wait to see the finished result(s)

Also, I recommend a cyan and green theme, green for the majority of the blade, and cyan for the edges.

Read full topic

Be my guest I dont mind and its fine you can post it i just wish i had time for myself well have fun cant wait to see it

item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

kirikugi:

I personally would like to see a 1 hander out of this. it seems it would be more appropriate. Well givin the current concept. And give it a weird NAME like Maltibolg or somthing of the sorts. Make it sorda Celticish

Wouldn’t you think that because it splits into two swords, that the main sword would be a 2H? That is the way i’d do it at least…

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @allinall allinall
item.description:
@allinall wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:6, topic:517991”]Interesting concept, but i think the hilt will need to be longer. By the way it is designed, it looks like it should be a two hand, which require quite a long handle. Good luck with this one.

I agree with elve age’s idea for the vine look, do you know what you’re going to call the weapon?[/quote]
No I really haven’t thought of a name for it but I’m willing to take ideas if anyone has one

Read full topic

item.title: New Project
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Interesting concept, but i think the hilt will need to be longer. By the way it is designed, it looks like it should be a two hand, which require quite a long handle. Good luck with this one.

I agree with elve age’s idea for the vine look, do you know what you’re going to call the weapon?

Read full topic
